    • Class org.kmfahey.jchessgame.BoardView

      class BoardView extends JComponent implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • blackHasMoved
          boolean blackHasMoved
          Used to track whether white has moved so far this turn.
        • chessboard
          Chessboard chessboard
          Manages the board's internal state.
        • chessGameFrame
          JChessGame chessGameFrame
          Implements the game window.
        • clickEventClickedPiece
          Chessboard.Piece clickEventClickedPiece
          The piece the player clicked on first.
        • clickEventMovingFrom
          int[] clickEventMovingFrom
          The coordinates of the square the player clicked on first.
        • clickEventMovingTo
          int[] clickEventMovingTo
          The coordinates of the square the player clicked on second.
        • clickEventToCapturePiece
          Chessboard.Piece clickEventToCapturePiece
          The piece the player clicked on second, if any.
        • colorOfAI
          int colorOfAI
          The color the AI is playing.
        • colorOfPlayer
          int colorOfPlayer
          The color the player is playing.
        • coordinatesManager
          CoordinatesManager coordinatesManager
          Manages the calculations to furnish exact measurements to draw the chessboard using Graphics.fillRect()
        • minimaxRunner
          MinimaxRunner minimaxRunner
          Hosts the minimax algorithm.
        • movesLog
          MovesLog movesLog
          Textarea, logs moves and recent player errors.
        • opposingMoveDelayTimer
          Timer opposingMoveDelayTimer
          Timer, triggers actionPerformed to run after mouseClicked is done.
        • pawnHasntBeenPromotedYet
          boolean pawnHasntBeenPromotedYet
          Used to track whether the pawn promotion dialog box has returned its outcome.
        • pawnToPromoteCoords
          int[] pawnToPromoteCoords
          The coordinates of the pawn to promote, if that's happening.
        • popupPawnPromotion
          PopupPawnPromotion popupPawnPromotion
          The pawn promotion dialog box.
        • RNG
          Random RNG
          Used in a few places where a coin toss is needed.
        • turnCount
          int turnCount
          A turn count.
        • whiteHasMoved
          boolean whiteHasMoved
          Used to track whether white has moved so far this turn.

    • Exception org.kmfahey.jchessgame.CastlingNotPossibleException

      class CastlingNotPossibleException extends Exception implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • reason
          int reason
          An integer flag indicating the precise reason castling wasn't possible. Uses the int flag constants defined in the MovesLog.MoveError record class.

    • Class org.kmfahey.jchessgame.JChessGame

      class JChessGame extends JFrame implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • boardSectionDims
          Dimension boardSectionDims
          Dimensions of the BoardView chessboard display in the GUI.
        • boardView
          BoardView boardView
          Displays and manages the chessboard region of the GUI.
        • chessboard
          Chessboard chessboard
          Tracks the internal state of the chessboard.
        • colorChoicePopupDelayTimer
          Timer colorChoicePopupDelayTimer
          Timer used to repeatedly prompt actionPerformed() to run until the color choice popup has returned and actionPerformed is able to run.
        • colorOnTop
          int colorOnTop
          Color playing from the top of the board.
        • colorPlaying
          int colorPlaying
          Color the player is playing.
        • coordinatesManager
          CoordinatesManager coordinatesManager
          Calculates the dimensions needed to draw the chessboard at the appropriate scale.
        • fileName
          String fileName
          Filename argument that was passed on the commandline, if any.
        • gameLayout
          GridBagLayout gameLayout
          Layout object.
        • gamePanel
          JPanel gamePanel
          Panel that all the GUI elements are attached to.
        • imagesManager
          ImagesManager imagesManager
          Manages the images directory and provides an accessor for retrieving scaled piece icons.
        • movesLog
          MovesLog movesLog
          Textarea beside the chessboard that logs the moves made and displays recent error messages from errant moves.
        • movesLogSectionDims
          Dimension movesLogSectionDims
          Dimensions of the MovesLog textarea in the GUI.
        • popupColorChoice
          PopupColorChoice popupColorChoice
          Dialog box spawned before the window is drawn for the player to choose which color they're playing.

    • Exception org.kmfahey.jchessgame.KingIsInCheckException

      class KingIsInCheckException extends Exception implements Serializable

    • Class org.kmfahey.jchessgame.MovesLog

      class MovesLog extends JTextArea implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • errorsList
          ArrayList<MovesLog.MoveError> errorsList
          Stores the MoveError objects accumulated by the object. It is cleared every time a valid Move is stored to the object. After redraw() prints the toString() value of every Chessboard.Move object in movesList, it prints the toString() of any MoveError objects in this list.
        • movesList
          ArrayList<Chessboard.Move> movesList
          Stores the Chessboard.Move objects recorded by the object. redraw() prints the toString() value of each of them in sequence to the textarea, followed by the toString() of any MoveError objects in errorsList.

    • Class org.kmfahey.jchessgame.PopupColorChoice

      class PopupColorChoice extends JFrame implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • callingChessGame
          JChessGame callingChessGame
          The JChessGame object that instanced this dialog box. Stored so its mutator JChessGame.setColorPlaying() can be used to convey the choice the player makes.

    • Class org.kmfahey.jchessgame.PopupGameOver

      class PopupGameOver extends JFrame implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • boardview
          BoardView boardview
          The BoardView object that the program is using. Stored so BoardView.blankBoard() can be called in the event the player wants to play again.
        • chessgame
          JChessGame chessgame
          The JChessGame object that instanced this dialog box. Stored so its method JChessGame.chooseColor() can be called, spawning the PopupColorChoice dialog box and priming JChessGame.actionPerformed() to be run once it closes.

    • Class org.kmfahey.jchessgame.PopupPawnPromotion

      class PopupPawnPromotion extends JFrame implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • buttonGroup
          ButtonGroup buttonGroup
          Contains the radio buttons and enforces their exclusivity.
        • callingBoardView
          BoardView callingBoardView
          Spawned this dialog box.
        • newPiece
          int newPiece
          Integer representation of the piece the pawn is being promoted to (not including color).
        • pawnXCoord
          int pawnXCoord
          X coordinate on the chessboard, in squares, of the pawn that's being promoted.
        • pawnYCoord
          int pawnYCoord
          Y coordinate on the chessboard, in squares, of the pawn that's being promoted.
        • RNG
          Random RNG
          Used to choose between LEFT and RIGHT in the case of a knight.
